directive: I want to delete unused functions, types, utils and other stuff from the repository

issues.title: Remove unused terminal color and style functions
issues.body:
## Summary

The terminal display module (`packages/cli/src/display/terminal.ts`) exports 12 color/style functions that are never imported or used anywhere in the codebase. These should be removed to reduce dead code.

## Unused exports to remove

**Style functions:**
- `strikethrough`

**Bright color functions (entire set):**
- `redBright`
- `greenBright`
- `yellowBright`
- `blueBright`
- `magentaBright`
- `cyanBright`

**Background color functions (entire set):**
- `bgRed`
- `bgGreen`
- `bgYellow`
- `bgBlue`
- `bgGray`

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] All 12 unused color/style functions are removed from `packages/cli/src/display/terminal.ts`
- [ ] No remaining imports of these functions exist anywhere in the codebase
- [ ] Any tests referencing these removed functions are updated or removed
- [ ] Project builds successfully (`npm run build:cli`)
- [ ] Tests pass (`npm test`)

issues.title: Remove unused type definitions from CLI types.ts
issues.body:
## Summary

The CLI types module (`packages/cli/src/types.ts`) exports several type definitions that are never imported or referenced outside the file. These should be cleaned up.

## Types to remove

1. **`CommandResult`** (interface) — Completely unused anywhere in the codebase. Definition:
   ```ts
   interface CommandResult { success: boolean; message?: string; error?: string; }
   ```

2. **`GitHubConfig`** (interface) — Never directly imported. Only used inline within the `LocusConfig` interface definition in the same file. Should be inlined as an anonymous type within `LocusConfig`.

3. **`AIConfig`** (interface) — Never directly imported. Only used inline within the `LocusConfig` interface definition in the same file. Should be inlined as an anonymous type within `LocusConfig`.

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] `CommandResult` interface is removed entirely
- [ ] `GitHubConfig` is inlined into `LocusConfig` (its fields placed directly in the `github` property type)
- [ ] `AIConfig` is inlined into `LocusConfig` (its fields placed directly in the `ai` property type)
- [ ] No compile errors from the changes
- [ ] Project builds successfully (`npm run build:cli`)
- [ ] Tests pass (`npm test`)

issues.title: Remove unused isKnownModel function and unexported model arrays
issues.body:
## Summary

The `packages/cli/src/core/ai-models.ts` module exports a validation function and model constant arrays that are never imported by any other module.

## Items to remove

1. **`isKnownModel(model: string): boolean`** — Exported function, never imported or called anywhere
2. **`CLAUDE_MODELS`** — Exported array constant, never imported outside `ai-models.ts`
3. **`CODEX_MODELS`** — Exported array constant, never imported outside `ai-models.ts`

**Note:** If `CLAUDE_MODELS` and `CODEX_MODELS` are used internally within the same file (e.g., to build lookup Sets), keep them as non-exported (`const` without `export`). Only remove the `export` keyword if they are still needed internally; delete entirely if not.

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] `isKnownModel` function is removed
- [ ] `CLAUDE_MODELS` and `CODEX_MODELS` are either removed entirely or have their `export` keyword removed (depending on internal usage)
- [ ] No remaining imports of these symbols exist in the codebase
- [ ] Project builds successfully (`npm run build:cli`)
- [ ] Tests pass (`npm test`)

issues.title: Deduplicate progressBar in sprint.ts
issues.body:
## Summary

The file `packages/cli/src/commands/sprint.ts` contains a local/private `progressBar()` function that duplicates the exported `progressBar()` function from `packages/cli/src/display/progress.ts`. The local copy should be removed and replaced with an import from the display module.

## Details

- **Duplicate location:** `packages/cli/src/commands/sprint.ts` (local function)
- **Canonical location:** `packages/cli/src/display/progress.ts` (exported function)
- Compare both implementations to confirm they are functionally equivalent before replacing
- If the implementations differ slightly, align the canonical version to cover both use cases

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] Local `progressBar()` function in `sprint.ts` is removed
- [ ] `sprint.ts` imports `progressBar` from `../display/progress.ts` (or the appropriate relative path)
- [ ] Behavior is preserved — the sprint command output looks the same
- [ ] Project builds successfully (`npm run build:cli`)
- [ ] Tests pass (`npm test`)

issues.title: Remove unused formatDuration export
issues.body:
## Summary

The `formatDuration` function in `packages/cli/src/display/progress.ts` is exported but never directly imported by any other module. It is only used internally within the same file by the `createTimer()` function.

## Details

- **File:** `packages/cli/src/display/progress.ts`
- **Function:** `formatDuration(ms: number): string`
- The function is used internally by `createTimer()` in the same file, so it should be kept but its `export` keyword removed

- [ ] No external modules import `formatDuration`

issues.title: Verify build and test suite after all removals
issues.body:
## Summary

After all unused code has been removed across the previous issues, perform a final verification pass to ensure nothing was broken.

## Steps

1. Run the full build for all packages:
   - `npm run build:cli`
   - `npm run build:packages`
   - `cd apps/www && npm run build`
2. Run the full test suite: `npm test`
3. Run the linter: `npm run lint`
4. Verify no TypeScript errors: `npx tsc --noEmit` (in each package)
5. Do a final grep for any remaining references to deleted symbols

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] All packages build without errors
- [ ] All tests pass
- [ ] Linter reports no new issues
- [ ] TypeScript type checking passes with no errors
- [ ] No dangling references to removed symbols exist in the codebase
